definition: on one's deathbed/at the point of death

sentences.english: At this festive occasion, wish business was flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 值此佳節之際，恭祝事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: Women pray together at the edge of the tip at the end of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 齋月結束之際婦女們一起聚在垃圾場的邊上祈禱。

sentences.english: Kindly inform us when this is put into effect.
sentences.chinese: 在本項目實行之際，煩請通知我們一聲。

sentences.english: The emblem was mounted on the Tiananmen Gate on the occasion of the first anniversary of the People’s Republic.
sentences.chinese: 在建國一週年之際，國徽掛上了天安門。

sentences.english: Just when I was almost finished, Henry came along and toppled the house of cards.
sentences.chinese: 工作即將完成之際，亨利進來攪局，讓我全功盡棄。

sentences.english: Even as we speak, grim time speeds swift awny .
sentences.chinese: 即使在我們講話之際，無情的時光也會飛馳而去。

sentences.english: There they waited while the heavy rains fell.
sentences.chinese: 大雨傾盆之際，他們就在那兒等待着。

sentences.english: So may God bless those brave men and women in uniform who are away from their families this holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 請上帝保佑這些在佳節之際仍遠在他鄉的英勇士兵們。

sentences.english: What do investors do when the government sounds a warning about inflation?
sentences.chinese: 政府對通貨膨脹發出警告之際，投資者該怎麼做？

sentences.english: Luji is one important writer and theorist of arts during Wei and Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 陸機是我國魏晉之際的重要作家和文學理論家。

sentences.english: S. corn shipments in November and December came amid record-high imports of the yellow grain to China.
sentences.chinese: 此事恰逢中國進口玉米創紀錄高點之際。

sentences.english: I'd love to congratulate you as you graduate.
sentences.chinese: 在你畢業之際，我向你表明衷心祝福。

sentences.english: To all of them we pay tribute on the occasion of the 2010 World Meteorological Day.
sentences.chinese: 值此2010年世界氣象日之際，我們謹向他們致敬。

sentences.english: State media on both sides have remained quiet on the 30th anniversary of the war.
sentences.chinese: 雙方的國家媒體在戰爭的30週年之際都保持了沉默。

sentences.english: The influence of metaphysics on poems can be traced back to the Wei and Jin dynasties, when metaphysics coming in- to being.
sentences.chinese: 玄學對詩歌的影響可上推至魏晉之際玄學初起之時。

sentences.english: Wu, poisson if poor if dead stream, deer, turn die alone between military ravines occasion.
sentences.chinese: 兀若枯木，泊若窮流，鹿獨戎馬之間，轉死溝壑之際。
